definition: act of correcting an error or a fault or an evil, provide relief for
details:
noun
- act of correcting an error or a fault or an evil
= synonyms: redress
- a medicine or therapy that cures disease or relieve pain
= synonyms: therapeutic, cure
verb
- provide relief for
= example: provide relief for
= synonyms: relieve
- set straight or right
= example: set straight or right
= synonyms: repair, rectify, remediate, amend
